texasholdem

Interface Client


  • public interface Client
    A player client showing the table information and acting on behalf of the player.

    Must be implemented by any client representing a player, either human or bot.
    Author:
    Oscar Stigter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Requests this player to act, selecting one of the allowed actions.

      Handles the rotation of the actor (the player who's turn it is).
      void boardUpdated(java.util.List<Card> cards, int bet, int pot)
      Handles an update of the board.
      void handStarted(Player dealer)
      Handles the start of a new hand.

        Handles a game message.

      • joinedTable

        void joinedTable(Game game,
                 int bigBlind,
                 java.util.List<Player> players)
        Handles the player joining a table.
        Parameters:
        type - The table type (betting structure).
        bigBlind - The table's big blind.
        players - The players at the table (including this player).

      • boardUpdated

        void boardUpdated(java.util.List<Card> cards,
                  int bet,
                  int pot)
        Handles an update of the board.
        Parameters:
        cards - The community cards.
        bet - The current bet.
        pot - The current pot.

      • playerActed

        void playerActed(Player player)
        Handles the event of a player acting.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that has acted.

      • act

        Action act(int minBet,
           int currentBet,
           java.util.Set<Action> allowedActions)
        Requests this player to act, selecting one of the allowed actions.
        Parameters:
        minBet - The minimum bet.
        currentBet - The current bet.
        allowedActions - The allowed actions.
        Returns:
        The selected action.
